```{r setup, echo=FALSE}

    library(knitr)

    params = list(crop = "Canola",
                  cultivar = "ATR_Stingray")
}
crop <- params[["crop"]]
cultivar <- params[["cultivar"]]
crop_cache_dir <- ".cache"

# Read the obs/prediction files

    here()

obs_sim <- readRDS(file_path)
```
